Description.Name: Solaris Gladiator
Description.Details:
A [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSolaris7],Solaris 7]] Gladiator, ready to rumble.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkGladiator],Gladiator]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkHonest],Honest]]
Equipment: assorted [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StarterBundleGladiator],gladiator equipment]].

OptionDescription:
You took your skills as a MechWarrior to the famed arena planet of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSolaris7],Solaris VII]]. There, you eked out a living as a gladiator, fighting for the crowd in minor arenas, getting by from paycheck to paycheck.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]]
Intro:
You were a low-level champion, down on your luck and one bad fight away from the gutter, until Raju heard about you. He trekked all the way to [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSolaris7],Solaris]] to offer you passage back to the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganReach],Aurigan Reach]], and a job in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseArano],House Arano]] Royal Guard.

So it is that you find yourself reunited with your old mentor, preparing your ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] for guard duty on the coronation day of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKameaArano],Lady Kamea Arano]]â€¦
BioDescription: Eager to escape your past, you took your Blackjack and your skills as a MechWarrior to the famed arena planet of Solaris VII. There, you eked out a living as a gladiator, fighting for the crowd in minor arenas, getting by from paycheck to paycheck.
